text: I have aquestion on the drag n drop email. Is there a way HS can include a wrapping table and assign the BG color to that? When a user hits "Reply" on the email, the whole email BG is the color you have chosen for the email and makes it hard for them to type a response. While some might understannd to just simply change the font color, others may not be so email savvy
simple removing the `bgcolor` attribute from the body tag should do it as well
